body:
+ Clarify version requirements for Random123.  Newer versions of Draco can use newer versions of Random123.
+ Fix a python version requirement that had inverted (and confusing) requirements for Draco-7_7_0. Newer versions of Draco require `python@3.5:`.
+ Revert the variant name `+superlu-dist` to a hyphen instead of an underscore to match trilinos/package.py.
title: [package][new version] Provide draco-7_11_0
